metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10117 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Firejail does not restrict access to --tmpfs, which allows local users to gain privileges, as demonstrated by mounting over /etc.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10117` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firejail - 0.9.38-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firejail package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.38-1').
